item.title: 美元在 PCE 和关税冲击前徘徊不前
item.description: 由于对关税导致美国经济增长放缓的担忧推低了美国收益率、股市和美元汇率，美元汇率在上周五趋于平稳，并在下周出现季度性下跌。【原文：The dollar was headed for a steady week on Friday and a quarterly loss next week as concern about tariffs slowing U.S. growth has pushed down U.S. yields, stocks and the currency.】

item.title: Star Entertainment 的悉尼赌场执照暂停期延长至 9 月
item.description: 澳大利亚陷入困境的赌场运营商 Star Entertainment 周五表示，根据新南威尔士州独立赌场委员会（NICC）的建议，其 Star Sydney 赌场的执照将至少暂停至 9 月 30 日。【原文：Australian embattled casino operator Star Entertainment said on Friday that its casino licence for Star Sydney will remain suspended until at least September 30, as advised by the New South Wales Independent Casino Commission (NICC).】

item.title: 澳大利亚竞争监督机构批准维珍航空与卡塔尔航空结盟
item.description: 澳大利亚竞争监管机构周五表示，已授权维珍澳大利亚航空公司和卡塔尔航空公司以综合联盟的形式在多哈与悉尼、墨尔本、布里斯班和珀斯之间运营航班，为期五年。【原文：Australia's competition regulator said on Friday it had granted authorisation to Virgin Australia and Qatar Airways to operate flights between Doha and Sydney, Melbourne, Brisbane and Perth under an integrated alliance for five years.】

item.title: 消息人士称，美国正推动与乌克兰达成更广泛的矿产协议
item.description: 据三位熟悉正在进行的谈判的人士透露，路透社获得的一份提案草案摘要显示，特朗普政府已提议与乌克兰达成一项新的、范围更广的矿产协议。【原文：The Trump administration has proposed a new, more expansive minerals deal with Ukraine, according to three people familiar with the ongoing negotiations and a summary of a draft proposal obtained by Reuters.】

item.title: Semafor 记者称，新日铁、美国钢铁公司正在积极洽谈每股 55 美元的交易
item.description: Semafor 记者罗汉-戈斯瓦米（Rohan Goswami）在 X 网站上发文称，新日铁和美国钢铁公司正在积极洽谈交易，美国钢铁公司将以每股 55 美元的价格收购新日铁。【原文：Nippon Steel and U.S. Steel are in active talks about a deal that would offer $55 per share to U.S. Steel, Semafor reporter Rohan Goswami said in a post on X.】

item.title: 美联储主席巴金关税下的汽车企业将在定价和利润率方面面临艰难抉择
item.description: 里士满联储主席汤姆-巴金（Tom Barkin）表示，他预计消费者不会完全受到特朗普政府对进口汽车征收 25% 税收的影响，但他补充说，企业在定价和利润率方面将面临艰难的选择。【原文：Richmond Federal Reserve President Tom Barkin said he did not expect consumers to face the full brunt of the 25% tax the Trump administration has set on imported cars, but added firms will have difficult choices ahead on pricing and profit margins.】

item.title: 美国国家航空航天局（NASA）和波音公司将开始测试 "星际客机"，计划于 2026 年初进行下一次飞行
item.description: 美国国家航空航天局（NASA）周四表示，在波音公司的CST-100 Starliner首次飞往国际空间站的任务因系统故障而被迫延长停留时间后，该局正朝着今年晚些时候或2026年初对其进行载人飞行认证的方向迈进。【原文：NASA said on Thursday it was moving toward certifying Boeing's CST-100 Starliner for crewed flights later this year or by early 2026 after its inaugural mission to the International Space Station was marred by a system fault, forcing an extended stay.】

item.title: 马斯克称特斯拉员工和客户蒙受巨大损失 -福克斯新闻
item.description: 特斯拉首席执行官埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）周三在福克斯新闻的 "布雷特-拜尔特别报道 "节目中被问及特斯拉在经销商处发生的纵火袭击等事件时说，特斯拉员工和客户受到了极大的伤害。【原文：Tesla Chief Executive Elon Musk said on Wednesday that a great wrong was being done to Tesla employees and customers when asked on Fox News' "Special Report with Brett Baier" about incidents at dealerships that include arson attacks.】

item.title: 美国太空部队授予火箭实验室和斯托克太空公司国家安全合同
item.description: 美国太空部队太空系统司令部周四表示，已授予美国火箭实验室（Rocket Lab USA）和斯托克太空公司（Stoke Space）合同，以扩大其关键太空能力发射系统的产品组合。【原文：​The U.S. Space Force's Space Systems Command said on Thursday it had awarded contracts to Rocket Lab USA and Stoke Space to expand its portfolio of launch systems for critical space capability.】

item.title: 内部备忘录称，亚马逊米高梅影业主管珍-萨尔克将离职
item.description: 据路透社报道，Prime Video 和亚马逊美高梅在线娱乐官网工作室（Amazon MGM Studios）负责人迈克-霍普金斯（Mike Hopkins）在发给员工的一份内部备忘录中称，亚马逊美高梅在线娱乐官网工作室负责人珍-萨尔克（Jen Salke）将卸任，创办一家新的制作实体。【原文：Jen Salke, head of Amazon's MGM Studios, will step down from her role to start a new production entity, according to an internal memo sent to employees by Prime Video and Amazon MGM Studios head Mike Hopkins, as seen by Reuters.】

item.title: 美联储主席柯林斯表示，关税显然将在短期内推动通胀上升
item.description: 波士顿联邦储备银行行长苏珊-柯林斯（Susan Collins）周四表示，特朗普政府的关税将推动美国通胀率上升，但目前尚不清楚这种上升压力的持续性如何。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Boston President Susan Collins said on Thursday that Trump administration tariffs will drive up U.S. inflation but it is unclear how persistent that upward pressure will be.】

item.title: Liberty 首席执行官古塞克认为钢铁关税对油田服务的影响不大
item.description: 自由能源公司（Liberty Energy）首席执行官罗恩-古塞克（Ron Gusek）周四表示，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）决定对进口钢铁征收关税，油田服务供应商的盈利将受到适度冲击。【原文：Oilfield service providers will face modest hits to earnings from U.S. President Donald Trump's decision to impose tariffs on steel imports, Liberty Energy Chief Executive Ron Gusek said on Thursday.】

item.title: 意大利政府高官加入意法半导体监事会
item.description: 三位消息人士称，意大利打算任命负责管理国营企业和资产处置的经济部部门主管马尔切洛-萨拉（Marcello Sala）为芯片制造商意法半导体的监事会成员。【原文：Italy intends to appoint Marcello Sala, head of an economy ministry department that manages state-run firms and asset disposals, as a supervisory board member at chip maker STMicroelectronics , three sources said.】

item.title: 交易日 投资者寻找谨慎的汽车动机
item.description: 交易日【原文：TRADING DAY】

item.title: 解说员：Citgo拍卖重启出现新的债权人之争
item.description: 委内瑞拉拥有的美国炼油商 Citgo Petroleum 母公司的股份拍卖在重新启动后被建议以较低的起拍价进行，因此，一名试图推进拍卖的美国联邦法官正在处理债权人之间的新纠纷。【原文：A U.S. federal judge trying to move ahead with an auction of shares in the parent of Venezuela-owned U.S. refiner Citgo Petroleum is dealing with a fresh dispute between creditors after a lowball starting bid was recommended in a reboot of the sale.】

item.title: 美联储主席巴金广泛的不确定性可能打击需求，政策正处于良好状态，等待更多澄清
item.description: 里士满联储主席汤姆-巴尔金（Tom Barkin）周四表示，美联储目前的 "适度限制性 "货币政策适合于美国政府政策不确定性异常大且变化迅速的环境。【原文：The Federal Reserve's current "moderately restrictive" monetary policy is right for an environment with an abnormal amount of uncertainty and fast changes taking place in U.S. government policy, Richmond Fed President Tom Barkin said on Thursday.】

item.title: 自由欧洲电台称特朗普政府撤销了拨款终止令
item.description: 美国政府资助的自由欧洲电台/自由电台周四表示，其上级机构已经撤销了终止对其拨款的命令，此前该新闻机构曾就削减拨款一事起诉特朗普政府。【原文：U.S. government-funded Radio Free Europe/Radio Liberty said on Thursday that its parent agency had rescinded an order terminating its grant funding, after the news outlet sued the Trump administration over the cuts.】

item.title: Lululemon 预测年度业绩低于预期
item.description: Lululemon Athletica 周四预测的年度收入和利润低于预期，原因是缺乏更新的款式，促使顾客寻找 Alo Yoga 和 Vuori 等竞争对手的产品。【原文：Lululemon Athletica forecast annual revenue and profit below estimates on Thursday, as the lack of newer styles has been pushing customers to look for products from competitors such as Alo Yoga and Vuori.】

item.title: 特朗普提名的候选人说，她不会管理有利于埃隆-马斯克的互联网项目
item.description: 特朗普政府提名的负责监管一项价值 420 亿美元的政府基金的人选周四否认，她将管理这项旨在为 "星链"（Starlink）所有者埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）谋利的计划。【原文：The Trump administration's nominee to oversee a $42 billion government fund to bring high-speed broadband internet to unserved or underserved parts of the United States denied on Thursday that she would administer the program to benefit Starlink owner Elon Musk.】

item.title: Downdetector 显示，数以千计美国用户的 Reddit 出现故障，X 的中断情况有所缓解
item.description: 据停机跟踪网站 Downdetector.com 称，由于 X 的服务似乎趋于稳定，周四 Reddit 在美国有数千名用户停机。【原文：Reddit was down for thousands of users in the U.S. on Thursday, as X's services appeared to stabilize, according to outage tracking website Downdetector.com.】

item.title: 中国政府放宽出口登记后，美国对华牛肉销售下滑
item.description: 美国政府周四的数据显示，在中国政府允许数百家美国肉类加工厂出口牛肉的注册到期后，美国对华牛肉销量大幅下滑。【原文：U.S. beef sales to China have taken a dive, U.S. government data showed on Thursday, after Beijing allowed the expiration of registrations that had permitted exports from hundreds of American meat facilities.】

item.title: 中国安全公司威视在欧盟检查上诉中败诉
item.description: 中国安全公司威视称，欧洲最高法院驳回了其要求暂停执行欧盟委员会对该公司进行检查的决定的上诉。【原文：Chinese security firm Nuctech said Europe's top court had rejected its appeal to suspend a decision by the European Commission to inspect the company.】

item.title: 分析师称，去美元化可能因美国的孤立主义政策而加速
item.description: 德意志银行（Deutsche Bank）分析师说，如果作为全球金融稳定基石的美联储在紧张时期停止向盟国提供美元资金，那么全球就会大大降低对该货币的依赖，这对美国来说是一把 "双刃剑"。【原文：If the Federal Reserve, a bedrock of global financial stability, were to withhold dollar funding to allies during times of stress, the world could greatly reduce its reliance on the currency, creating "a doubled-edged sword" for the U.S., Deutsche Bank analysts said.】

item.title: CBO 认为美国赤字 30 年来不断增加，经济增长放缓
item.description: 美国国会预算办公室周四预计，未来30年联邦预算赤字和债务将大幅增加，部分原因是利息成本迅速上升，同时该办公室还描绘了经济增长疲软和劳动力萎缩的前景。【原文：The U.S. Congressional Budget Office on Thursday projected significant increases in federal budget deficits and debt over the next 30 years, in part due to rapidly rising interest costs, as it sketched out sluggish economic growth and a shrinking workforce.】

item.title: 特朗普征收汽车关税使美联储审议利率问题复杂化
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统对进口汽车征收 25% 的永久性关税，扩大了全球贸易战的规模，助长了人们对汽车和其他产品价格上涨的预期，但对解决关于其执政两个月来的政策将如何影响美国经济的争论却作用甚微。【原文：President Donald Trump's permanent 25% tariff on imported autos has expanded the global trade war, feeding expectations for higher prices for cars and other products, but doing little to settle the debate about how policies of his two-month-old administration will affect the U.S. economy.】

item.title: 刺客信条》作者育碧在腾讯支持下成立 40 亿欧元子公司
item.description: 法国电子游戏制造商育碧公司（Ubisoft）周四表示，该公司已成立了一家子公司，中国腾讯将向其投资 11.6 亿欧元（12.5 亿美元）。【原文：French videogame maker Ubisoft said on Thursday it has set up a subsidiary in which China's Tencent will invest 1.16 billion euros ($1.25 billion).】

item.title: 可口可乐将在阿根廷投资超过 14 亿美元
item.description: 可口可乐阿根廷公司周四在一份声明中表示，该公司和装瓶商将在南美国家投资超过 14 亿美元，以提高产量、改善物流和优化基础设施。【原文：Coca-Cola Argentina and bottlers will invest more than $1.4 billion in the South American country to boost production, improve logistics, and optimize infrastructure, the company said in a statement on Thursday.】

item.title: 诺和诺德股价有望创 2002 年以来最大单月跌幅，投资者担忧加剧
item.description: 诺和诺德股价 3 月份迄今已下跌 25%，并有望创下自 2002 年 7 月以来的最大单月跌幅，因为投资者更加担心这家肥胖症药物市场的先驱已失去了对美国礼来公司的优势。【原文：Novo Nordisk shares have fallen 25% so far in March and are on track for their biggest monthly drop since July 2002, as investor worries intensify that the obesity drug market pioneer has lost its edge over U.S. Eli Lilly .】

item.title: 沃尔格林支付超过 285 万美元解决美国多收费指控
item.description: 美国司法部周四表示，沃尔格林公司将支付超过 285 万美元，以了结举报人指控该药房向佐治亚州和马萨诸塞州的医疗补助计划多收非专利药品费用的指控。【原文：Walgreen will pay more than $2.85 million to settle whistleblower allegations that the pharmacy overbilled Medicaid programs in Georgia and Massachusetts for generic medications, the U.S. Department of Justice said on Thursday.】

item.title: 德国肖尔茨称特朗普的关税政策是错误的，所有人都将蒙受损失
item.description: 德国总理奥拉夫-肖尔茨（Olaf Scholz）周四表示，唐纳德-特朗普对汽车征收关税的决定是错误的，美国总统选择了一条只会产生输家的道路。【原文：German Chancellor Olaf Scholz said on Thursday Donald Trump's decision to impose tariffs on cars is wrong and the U.S. president had chosen a path that would produce only losers.】
